siteName: Drury Inn & Suites Birmingham Lakeshore Drive

brandIdentity.designSummary: This design features a minimalist and editorial aesthetic with a strong emphasis on typography and spatial balance. The layout uses a clean two-column grid with asymmetrical splits, combining large, elegant serif headings with simple sans-serif body text. The color palette is restrained, dominated by white backgrounds and black text, complemented by a muted olive custom accent for grounding elements like the footer. Generous white space and subtle dividing lines create a spacious, airy feel. Navigation and UI elements are minimal and understated, supporting a focus on content clarity and refined presentation. Overall, the design conveys a timeless, luxurious, and professional brand identity suitable for creative and design-focused industries.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Sophisticated, refined, professional, and elegant with a calm and editorial personality.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' color predominantly for all main text elements, including headings, project titles, and navigation text on light backgrounds. The 'secondary' color serves as the base background, providing a clean and spacious canvas. The 'secondaryForeground' color is used for text on the 'secondary' background, ensuring high readability. The 'footerBackground' custom color is reserved for footer backgrounds, creating a warm, grounded contrast to the white page backgrounds. Text and links within the footer should use 'primaryForeground' to maintain legibility. This palette supports a high-contrast, elegant look with minimal color distractions, emphasizing typography and layout. Avoid using colors from content images to maintain brand consistency and clarity.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primary' black (#000000) on 'secondary' white (#FFFFFF) background achieves excellent WCAG AAA contrast ratios for all text sizes, ensuring maximum readability. The 'primaryForeground' white (#FFFFFF) on 'footerBackground' (#7A6F4E) provides sufficient contrast to meet WCAG AA standards for body text and links. The palette's high contrast between text and backgrounds supports accessibility and legibility across devices and lighting conditions.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the 'playfair display' font for all major headings and project titles to convey sophistication and elegance. Pair with a clean sans-serif for body text to maintain readability and modernity. Maintain generous letter spacing and line height to enhance clarity and preserve the editorial tone. Headings should be black ('primary') on white ('secondary') backgrounds for maximum contrast. Avoid using the heading font for small text or body copy to prevent legibility issues.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'playfair display' on 'secondary' white background with 'primary' black text meet WCAG AAA contrast standards, ensuring clear readability even at large sizes.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use 'open sans' for all body text, navigation links, and footer content to provide a clean and legible reading experience. Combine with 'playfair display' headings for a balanced typographic hierarchy. Maintain consistent font sizes and line heights to ensure comfortable reading. Text color should be 'primary' black on 'secondary' white backgrounds, and 'primaryForeground' white on 'footerBackground' for footer text. Avoid using the body font for large display text to preserve the editorial style.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Body text in 'open sans' with 'primary' black on 'secondary' white background meets WCAG AAA contrast requirements, supporting accessibility for all users.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a vertical split layout with large, vertically stacked typography on the left side, balanced by a large image on the right. The heading text is oversized and vertically aligned to create a strong visual spine that anchors the design. This placement emphasizes the brand name and core message with maximum impact, while the image provides contextual warmth and interest. The typography is carefully spaced with generous line height and letter spacing to maintain elegance and readability.

components.containers: Containers are clean and minimal with no visible borders or shadows, relying on white space and grid alignment to separate content areas. The footer container uses a solid 'footerBackground' color to visually anchor the page.
components.images: Images are large, high-quality, and used as focal points, often occupying half the screen width in split layouts. They have no borders or overlays, maintaining a natural and warm aesthetic that complements the minimal design.
components.buttons: Buttons are minimal or absent in the screenshots; if used, they should be understated with simple outlines or solid fills in 'primary' black or 'footerBackground' colors, maintaining the refined aesthetic.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are minimal and functional, such as the simple hamburger menu icon composed of three horizontal lines in 'primary' black, supporting the clean design without distraction.
graphicElements.illustrations: No illustrations are present, reinforcing the minimalist and professional tone.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are used, maintaining a clean and uncluttered interface.

brandIdentity.designSummary: This design features a harmonious blend of natural, earthy tones with a restrained and elegant color palette centered on deep forest green, soft beige, and muted yellow accents. The layout is grid-based and balanced, with generous spacing and rounded corners that soften the overall aesthetic. Typography is serif-based, combining elegance with approachability, supporting a wholesome and artisanal brand identity. Buttons and interactive elements use the yellow accent to draw attention subtly, while the dark green provides strong contrast for text and backgrounds. The overall visual style is clean, modern, and nature-inspired, evoking sustainability, calmness, and trustworthiness, suitable for brands emphasizing natural and plant-based products.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Natural, authentic, approachable, and trustworthy with a calm and artisanal personality.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' color for main text, headers, and key UI elements to establish a strong natural presence. The 'secondary' color serves as the base background, providing a soft, warm canvas that supports readability and calmness. The 'primaryForeground' color is used for text on 'primary' backgrounds to ensure legibility. The 'secondaryForeground' is used for text on 'secondary' backgrounds, maintaining contrast and clarity. The 'accentYellow' color is reserved for call-to-action buttons, highlights, and interactive elements to attract attention without disrupting the calm tone. The 'darkBackground' can be used for testimonial sections or footers to create visual separation, with 'lightBackground' text for contrast. Colors should be combined thoughtfully to maintain accessibility and a cohesive natural aesthetic.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primary' color (#2B3A2E) on 'secondary' (#D9D6C3) background achieves WCAG AA contrast for body text and headings. The 'accentYellow' (#E6E27A) on 'primary' (#2B3A2E) background meets WCAG AA contrast for buttons and call-to-actions. Text in 'primaryForeground' (#D9D6C3) on 'primary' (#2B3A2E) background also meets WCAG AA standards. The palette ensures sufficient contrast for readability across all text and background combinations used in the design.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the heading font for all major titles and section headers to convey elegance and approachability. Pair with the paragraph font for body text to maintain readability and a cohesive organic feel. Maintain generous line spacing and avoid overly tight letter spacing to preserve clarity. Headings should contrast strongly with backgrounds using the 'primary' or 'darkBackground' colors for emphasis.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'primary' or 'darkBackground' colors on 'secondary' or 'lightBackground' backgrounds meet WCAG AA contrast standards, ensuring readability for users with visual impairments.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the paragraph font for all body text, descriptions, and smaller informational text. It pairs well with the serif heading font to create a balanced typographic hierarchy. Maintain comfortable line height and letter spacing for readability. Text color should primarily be 'primary' or 'secondaryForeground' to ensure contrast against backgrounds.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Paragraph text colors on their respective backgrounds meet WCAG AA contrast requirements, supporting accessibility and legibility.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a two-column grid with text and image balanced side-by-side. Typography is placed in the left quadrant with ample padding and margin, creating a visual weight that anchors the design. The heading uses the serif font in a large size with the 'primary' color, while supporting text uses the sans-serif font in a smaller size and 'secondaryForeground' color. This placement creates a calm, inviting introduction that draws the eye naturally from text to image.

components.containers: Containers have soft rounded corners and use the 'secondary' or 'darkBackground' colors for backgrounds. Padding is generous to create breathing room. Borders are minimal or absent, relying on color blocks to define sections.
components.images: Images are presented with rounded corners matching container radii, often paired side-by-side with text. They use natural lighting and warm tones, complementing the color palette. Some images have subtle overlays to enhance text readability.
components.buttons: Buttons use the 'accentYellow' color for filled backgrounds with 'primary' color text, or are outlined with 'primary' color and transparent backgrounds. Corners are rounded, and buttons have consistent padding and font styling to maintain a cohesive look.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are minimal and organic in style, using the 'primary' or 'accentYellow' colors. They complement the natural theme without overwhelming the design.
graphicElements.illustrations: No prominent illustrations are used; the design relies on photography and minimal graphic motifs such as leaf shapes in 'accentYellow' to reinforce the natural brand identity.
graphicElements.stickers: Stickers or badges use the 'accentYellow' background with 'primary' text, rounded corners, and simple shapes to highlight key messages or calls to action.

brandIdentity.designSummary: This design features a warm, neutral color palette dominated by soft beige and cream backgrounds paired with deep brown text, creating a classic and inviting atmosphere. The typography is bold and geometric, with very large, heavy-weight sans-serif headings that command attention, balanced by smaller but still bold body text for readability. The layout is spacious and modular, employing generous negative space and a clear grid alignment that balances text and imagery harmoniously. UI components such as buttons and navigation are minimal and understated, using thin borders and simple icons to maintain the elegant aesthetic. Photographic elements are warm and intimate, complementing the overall vintage-inspired yet modern style. This visual language conveys a refined, personal, and professional brand identity suitable for a variety of creative and lifestyle applications.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Warm, sophisticated, inviting, and timeless with a subtle vintage-modern blend.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' color predominantly for main text elements such as headings and key UI text to ensure strong readability against the 'background' and 'backgroundLight' colors. The 'secondary' color can be used for subheadings, secondary text, and subtle UI accents to create a layered visual hierarchy. Backgrounds should primarily use the 'background' and 'backgroundLight' colors to maintain a warm, inviting canvas that supports content without distraction. Buttons and interactive elements should use the 'buttonBorder' color for borders and outlines, paired with 'backgroundLight' for backgrounds to maintain the minimal and elegant style. This palette ensures a harmonious and accessible contrast while reinforcing the brand's warm and sophisticated tone.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primary' color on 'background' and 'backgroundLight' backgrounds meets WCAG AA contrast requirements for large and normal text, ensuring readability and accessibility. The 'secondary' color also maintains sufficient contrast on these backgrounds for secondary text elements. Button borders using 'buttonBorder' on 'backgroundLight' provide clear visual distinction for interactive elements. Overall, the palette supports accessible text and UI components while preserving the warm, vintage-inspired aesthetic.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the 'league spartan' font for all primary headings to create impactful, attention-grabbing titles. Pair with body text fonts that complement its geometric style for a cohesive look. Maintain generous spacing around headings to leverage their boldness without clutter. Headings should use the 'primary' color to ensure maximum contrast and brand consistency. Avoid using overly decorative fonts alongside to preserve clarity and professionalism.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'primary' color on 'background' or 'backgroundLight' backgrounds meet WCAG AA contrast standards for all sizes, ensuring clear readability and accessibility.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use 'open sans' for body text to provide clear, readable content that balances the bold headings. Body text should be set in the 'primary' or 'secondary' color depending on hierarchy, ensuring sufficient contrast against the background. Maintain consistent line height and spacing for comfortable reading. Combine with 'league spartan' headings for a modern yet timeless typographic system.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Body text in 'primary' or 'secondary' colors on 'background' or 'backgroundLight' backgrounds meets WCAG AA contrast requirements for normal and large text sizes.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a top-third anchor placement where the large, bold heading occupies the upper left portion of the viewport, creating immediate visual impact. The heading's oversized font size and tight letter spacing draw attention, balanced by ample negative space around it. Supporting text and call-to-action buttons are placed below the heading with consistent left alignment, maintaining a clean vertical flow. The right side features a portrait image that anchors the composition, creating a balanced two-column layout. This placement strategy emphasizes clarity and hierarchy while inviting users into the brand experience.

components.containers: Containers use soft background colors with generous padding and margins to create distinct content areas. Borders are minimal or absent, relying on spacing and color contrast to separate sections. The 'background' and 'backgroundLight' colors provide a warm canvas that supports content without distraction.
components.images: Images are presented with natural color tones and no heavy framing, integrated into the layout to balance text. They maintain a warm, intimate feel consistent with the brand palette and are sized to complement rather than dominate the page.
components.buttons: Buttons are minimal with thin borders in the 'buttonBorder' color and transparent backgrounds. Text inside buttons uses the 'primary' color for clarity. Hover states may invert colors subtly to indicate interactivity while maintaining the understated aesthetic.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are minimal and line-based, using the 'primary' color to maintain consistency and subtlety. They support navigation and UI without drawing excessive attention.
graphicElements.illustrations: No prominent illustrations are used; the design relies on photography and typography for visual interest.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are present, keeping the design clean and focused.

brandIdentity.designSummary: The design features a warm, earthy color palette with soft cream, pale greenish-beige, and deep brown tones that create a natural and elegant atmosphere. Typography plays a central role, with large, classic serif fonts for headings that convey craftsmanship and luxury, paired with clean serif body text for readability. The layout is spacious and balanced, using generous white space and a column-based grid with subtle asymmetry to maintain visual interest. UI components like buttons and containers are minimal and understated, emphasizing simplicity and elegance. The overall aesthetic is timeless and artisanal, suitable for brands that value natural materials and refined presentation.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Sophisticated, warm, artisanal, and refined with a calm and inviting personality.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'background' color as the primary page background to create a soft, warm canvas. The 'primary' color is ideal for headings, key text elements, and interactive text such as links and buttons, paired with 'primaryForeground' for contrast on dark backgrounds like the footer. The 'secondary' color serves well for section backgrounds or subtle highlights, with 'secondaryForeground' used for text on these backgrounds to maintain readability. The 'footerBackground' anchors the page footer with a deep, rich tone, contrasting with 'primaryForeground' text for accessibility. The 'linkColor' and 'buttonBorder' colors are used for interactive elements, ensuring they stand out while maintaining the natural, elegant aesthetic. This palette supports a calm, sophisticated atmosphere with strong accessibility and visual harmony.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primaryForeground' on 'primary' and 'footerBackground' colors meet WCAG AA contrast standards for large and normal text, ensuring readability. The 'secondaryForeground' on 'secondary' also meets contrast requirements for body text. Links and buttons using 'linkColor' and 'buttonBorder' on 'background' or 'secondary' backgrounds maintain sufficient contrast for accessibility compliance.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the 'bitter' font for all primary headings to convey sophistication and craftsmanship. Headings should be large, spaced with generous line height to enhance readability and elegance. Pair with body text fonts that are clean and legible to maintain hierarchy and balance. Use the 'primary' color for headings on light backgrounds and 'primaryForeground' on dark backgrounds to ensure contrast and accessibility.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'primary' on 'background' and 'primaryForeground' on 'footerBackground' meet WCAG AA contrast standards for all sizes, ensuring clear readability.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the 'bitter' font for body text to provide a clean, readable experience that complements the more decorative heading font. Maintain consistent line height and letter spacing for comfortable reading. Text color should be 'primary' on light backgrounds and 'primaryForeground' on dark backgrounds. Avoid overly small font sizes to preserve legibility, especially on mobile devices.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Body text in 'primary' on 'background' and 'primaryForeground' on 'footerBackground' meets WCAG AA contrast requirements for normal and large text.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome fold is divided into three distinct vertical panels of differing widths. The far left narrow column features strong branding or logo, often with a bold color background. The central, wider panel presents a powerful visual, such as a photo or artwork, serving as the primary focus. The far right column contains key information, such as event details and a call-to-action button. This layout creates a sophisticated, editorial look and striking asymmetry, drawing the eye to the image first, then to key actions and branding.

components.containers: Containers use subtle background color shifts between 'background' and 'secondary' to delineate sections softly without harsh borders, maintaining a clean and elegant flow. Padding is consistent to ensure content breathes and aligns with the overall spacious layout.
components.images: Images are presented with no borders or shadows, emphasizing natural textures and materials. They are integrated into the grid with balanced spacing, often paired side-by-side with text blocks to create harmony and visual interest.
components.buttons: Buttons are minimal with thin borders in 'buttonBorder' color and text in 'primary'. They have no heavy backgrounds, maintaining the understated elegance. On hover or focus, the button text or border may darken slightly to indicate interactivity while preserving subtlety.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are minimal or absent, focusing on typography and photography to convey the brand message. If used, icons would be line-based, simple, and in 'primary' color to maintain consistency.
graphicElements.illustrations: No illustrations are present; the design relies on photography and typography for visual storytelling.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are used, preserving the clean and sophisticated aesthetic.

brandBook.toneOfVoice: Sophisticated, refined, professional, and elegant with a calm and editorial personality.

Headings should be black ('primary') on white ('secondary') backgrounds for maximum contrast. Avoid using the heading font for small text or body copy to prevent legibility issues.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'playfair display' on 'secondary' white background with 'primary' black text meet WCAG AAA contrast standards, ensuring clear readability even at large sizes.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use 'open sans' for all body text, navigation links, and footer content to provide a clean and legible reading experience. Combine with 'playfair display' headings for a balanced typographic hierarchy. Maintain consistent font sizes and line heights to ensure comfortable reading. Text color should be 'primary' black on 'secondary' white backgrounds, and 'primaryForeground' white on 'footerBackground' for footer text. Avoid using the body font for large display text to preserve the editorial style.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Body text in 'open sans' with 'primary' black on 'secondary' white background meets WCAG AAA contrast requirements, supporting accessibility for all users.

The heading text is oversized and vertically aligned to create a strong visual spine that anchors the design. This placement emphasizes the brand name and core message with maximum impact, while the image provides contextual warmth and interest. The typography is carefully spaced with generous line height and letter spacing to maintain elegance and readability.

initialPrompt: Create a hotel website for Drury Inn & Suites Birmingham Lakeshore Drive. Include contact details, location, hours, check-in/check-out info, property overview, amenities, room types, pet policy, dining options, nearby attractions, special offers, policies, and ratings.
plan:
{
  "sections": [
    {
      "id": "overview",
      "title": "## Overview",
      "content": "This plan creates a hotel website for Drury Inn & Suites Birmingham Lakeshore Drive, displaying essential information about the property, its amenities, room types, dining, and nearby attractions."
    },
    {
      "id": "key-features",
      "title": "## Key features",
      "content": "- **View Hotel Information**: Displays contact details, location, hours, and check-in/check-out information.\n- **View Property Overview**: Provides a general description of the hotel.\n- **View Amenities Listing**: Lists all available amenities at the hotel.\n- **View Room Types Listing**: Shows all available room types.\n- **View Room Type Details**: Displays detailed information for each room type.\n- **View Pet Policy**: Outlines the hotel's policy regarding pets.\n- **View Dining Options Listing**: Lists the dining facilities and options available.\n- **View Dining Option Details**: Shows detailed information for each dining option.\n- **View Nearby Attractions Listing**: Displays a list of attractions near the hotel.\n- **View Nearby Attraction Details**: Provides details for each nearby attraction.\n- **View Special Offers Listing**: Shows current special offers and promotions.\n- **View Special Offer Details**: Displays detailed information for each special offer.\n- **View Policies**: Outlines general hotel policies.\n- **View Ratings**: Displays customer ratings and reviews for the hotel.",
      "metadata": [
        { "id": "view-hotel-information", "name": "View Hotel Information" },
        { "id": "view-property-overview", "name": "View Property Overview" },
        { "id": "view-amenities-listing", "name": "View Amenities Listing" },
        { "id": "view-room-types-listing", "name": "View Room Types Listing" },
        { "id": "view-room-type-details", "name": "View Room Type Details" },
        { "id": "view-pet-policy", "name": "View Pet Policy" },

        { "id": "view-nearby-attraction-details", "name": "View Nearby Attraction Details" },
        { "id": "view-special-offers-listing", "name": "View Special Offers Listing" },
        { "id": "view-special-offer-details", "name": "View Special Offer Details" },
        { "id": "view-policies", "name": "View Policies" },
        { "id": "view-ratings", "name": "View Ratings" }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "structure",
      "title": "## Structure",
      "content": "- **Header (Reusable)**: Contains the hotel name and navigation links.\n- **Footer (Reusable)**: Contains contact information and copyright details.\n- **Homepage**: Displays property overview, contact details, location, hours, and highlights.\n- **Rooms Page**: Hosts the listing and details for room types.\n- **Amenities Page**: Lists all hotel amenities.\n- **Dining Page**: Hosts the listing and details for dining options.\n- **Attractions Page**: Hosts the listing and details for nearby attractions.\n- **Offers Page**: Hosts the listing and details for special offers.\n- **Policies Page**: Displays pet policy and general policies.\n- **Ratings Page**: Shows customer ratings."
    }
  ],
  "apps": [
    {
      "id": "wix-cms",
      "keyFeatures": [
        { "id": "view-hotel-information", "name": "View Hotel Information" },
        { "id": "view-property-overview", "name": "View Property Overview" },
        { "id": "view-amenities-listing", "name": "View Amenities Listing" },
        { "id": "view-room-types-listing", "name": "View Room Types Listing" },
